name: W & L SALES CO., INC., and PMA Insurance Company, Appellants, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Toby L. Drake
name_abbreviation: W & L Sales Co. v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
parties: W & L SALES CO., INC., and PMA Insurance Company, Appellants, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Toby L. Drake.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Dennis J. Bonetti, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Gerard M. Mackarevich, Ira H. Weinstock, Ronald L. Calhoon, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
574 A.2d 603
W & L SALES CO., INC., and PMA Insurance Company, Appellants, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Toby L. Drake.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 10, 1990.
Decided May 23, 1990.
Dennis J. Bonetti, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Gerard M. Mackarevich, Ira H. Weinstock, Ronald L. Calhoon, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
